message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
